xprop.longdesc:
This beautiful and spacious home with four bedrooms and 2,400 square feet is more than enough room to enjoy a relaxing or adventurous getaway. The gorgeous view from the large balcony, with ample room to relax and sun-bathe, would make one believe they were in a dream. With two living rooms, one upstairs and one downstairs, parents can enjoy a comfortable and quiet afternoon while the children can watch their favorite movie and play adventurous games all at the same time. When those activities die down, enjoy a barbecue on the balcony with the amazing view or go fishing and maybe even catch dinner for the evening picnic. Play catch on the 75 feet of rolling sandy beach down by the water or curl up by the cozy fireplace. At night enjoy the luxury of a family bonfire and maybe swim by the light of the moon. The options and memories to be made are endless at the Calling of the Huron.

Bed Configurations: 2 Twins (Bedroom 1), 1 Full (Bedroom 2), 1 Queen (Bedroom 3), 1 Queen and 1 Daybed (Bedroom 4)

Open year round! Welcome to a perfect vacation cottage new updates this year! The AuSable River Home has 2 bedrooms, 1.5 bathrooms and the space to sleep 6 people. For adamant animal lovers, your cute ball of fur can take their much needed time off too as long as they are approved. This charming cottage is adorned by 200 feet of AuSable River front, which is perfect for fishing or to just watch ducks float by. Since you would already be relaxing outside, why not do it on the covered sun porch that faces the river? Relaxation can be found indoors as well. The house offers adequate lounging space around one of the 2 gas fireplaces. For someone looking to explore locally on their vacation, Lumberman's Monument or Iargo Springs could offer some adventure. Both have beautiful scenery and are abundant in local history. Find the softer side of life at the AuSable River Home.

Discounted Monthly Rental opportunity in off season October through May Call us for details.

xprop.longdesc:
Charming family cottage located on Tawas Point, just a short distance around to Tawas Point State Park and one of the most incredible white sand beaches we've ever seen. View glorious sunrises or amazing sunsets just a stroll away. The interior of this 1,000+ sqaure foot gem is glowing knotty pine with family room, living room, 2 bedrooms, 1 full bath with shower and tub, full kitchen, and it sleeps 6. New for 2017 furniture for the living room, new queen bed in master bedroom, outside in the private backyard you'll enjoy a new bonfire pit and picnic table. There is also a charcoal grill. Downtown East Tawas is only 4 miles away with a paved path all the way for biking/running/walking/rollerblading. Enjoy restaurants, movies, boutique stores, ice cream, the pier, etc. The Au Sable River is only a 15-minute drive for canoeing, kayaking, tubing and fishing. If you want to bring your boat or rent one, the marina is only a few blocks away. Launch your boat for the day or rent a slip for the week. Don't forget to see the Lighthouse and check out the amazing kite boarding and world-class birding. This is the spot for relaxing and recreating! You won't want to leave!!! Available Monthly Off Season Subject to Approval.

 Bed Configurations: 1 Queen (Bedroom 1), 1 Full (Bedroom 2), 1 Sofa Sleeper (Living Room)

xprop.longdesc:
Gorgeous! Waterfront home on the west side of Cedar Lake with 75 feet of private sandy beach, a boat dock and in-ground fire pit. Large living room with 60" HDTV with DVR, vaulted ceilings and french doors that lead out to a quiet, covered deck that overlooks the scenic, all sports Cedar lake. Sit and enjoy the view rain or shine. This home has a bright open kitchen with built in dishwasher & appliances. It comes complete with an elegant dining area with vaulted ceiling, hardwood floors and a large, beautiful bay window overlooking the back yard and wooded lot. Picturesque views of the lake from the master bedroom with a private full bath. Skylights in both bathrooms, large laundry room with extra storage & second refrigerator. This home is located half mile north of Lakewood Shores Golf Course and not far from Springport Hills, White Pine, Red Hawk and several others golf courses. Cedar Lake has swimming, canoeing, kayaking, boating and fishing and is close to the AuSable River, VanEtten Lake, Lake Huron and Huron National Forest, along with several state parks for summer and winter sports. You can launch your boat at the cement boat launch at the Public Park located inside of Lakewood Shores. For those that want to enjoy shopping, great dining or other activities, come visit the City of Oscoda, Harrisville and or Tawas.

xprop.longdesc:
This is a 2 bedroom, 2 bath ranch home with 100 feet of Lake Huron frontage in Black River Michigan. This home is 1500 square feet with central air, surrounded by quiet serenity. There are 2 living rooms, a recently remodeled kitchen with gorgeous views of the lake. Black River is located 25 minutes south of Alpena and 35 minutes north of Oscoda. Harrisville is a small, quaint town within a 10 minute drive; it features attractions such as the Sturgeon Point Light House and Cedar brook Trout Farm for kids (Located 5 minutes south of the property) are Ice Cream shops, yum! For the Nature lovers 4-5 miles from the home there are miles of Trailhead (Alcona ORV Trail (29.3 miles) & Bull Gap Trail (100 miles) located between Oscoda and Black River as well as two State Forest Camp Grounds (Harrisville & Negwegon State Park that has walking trails 2-3 miles of undeveloped beach). The Alcona Trail is only 40 minutes away. Also located 3 miles north is a boat launch on the Black River that feeds into Lake Huron and is great for Fishing. Pet friendly (dog only).

xprop.longdesc:
Open Year round! This beautifully appointed, upscale home is located on scenic Van Etten Lake in Oscoda, Michigan. This Rental Home is one of two homes that is situated on a larger lot on Van Etten Lake. It is an all-sports lake perfect for fishing, boating, waterskiing, canoeing, jet skiing, ice fishing, snowmobiling, kayaking, etc. You can tie your boat up on owners private dock while you clean your catch of the day at the fish cleaning station, which could be walleye, northern pike, bass, perch or any of the other various pan fish in the lake. Relax dockside in your comfortable Adirondack chair while watching the colorful sunsets atop the lake and roasting your marshmallows, s'mores or hot dogs over your modern fire pit.  End your day of dreams with a swim in the crystal clear waters of sandy bottomed Van Etten Lake. The upscale home is a fully furnished and includes a Culligan reverse osmosis water purification system, central air and Wi Fi  all of the amenities you would need to make your visit both comfortable as well as memorable. Two fully furnished bedrooms provide magnificent, sleeping areas with new queen size beds new linens and new Berber carpets. If you need a little more space, the fully furnished living room includes the comforts of a queen size pull out bed. Cook your fresh fish in the fully appointed kitchen with the added amenities of an omelet maker, waffle maker and bread maker. Each room has a ceiling fan for your comfort. Property is near Lumberman's Monument, scenic Au Sable River, the shores of Lake Huron, as well as canoe rentals. Also nearby are grocery stores, pharmacies and restaurants. Free concerts in downtown Oscoda, playground equipment, as well as ice cream parlors to complete your dream vacation at Socrates Place on beautiful Van Etten Lake. Owner occupies the front home,  but this home has its own entrance and walk way to the lake. If you're fortunate enough the homeowner may be around and inclined to take you on an exploration of Van Etten lake on their pontoon.  Homeowner is known to provide guests with firewood and fishing equipment if asked. You are sure enjoy the personal touches of this vacation rental home. 

About the Lake: https://www.vanettenlake.org/

 

Bed Configuration: 1 Queen (Bedroom 1), 1 Queen (Bedroom 2), 1 Queen Sleeper Sofa (Living Room)

 **Depending on the natural occurrence of lake levels they may be higher or lower than photographed. We do our best to post the most accurate photos.

For your reading enjoyment, please visit owners own website at: www.socratesplace.com

xprop.longdesc:
This 5 bedroom 3.5 bath Residential Log Home sleeps 14 includes a Sauna for up to 6 and Large Jacuzzi tub! This home is located close to Silver Creek and Corsair Ski Trails in the heart of Huron's National Forest this place would be awesome to bring your horses or snowmobiles to ride the trails nearby. It is a very secluded retreat with 15 acres of land that is surrounded by Huron National Forest; it's the perfect opportunity to connect with family and friends. Check out the loft area great for playing cards or use the downstairs Poker table!  Home has TV local channels only but you won’t need any more than that, enjoy the time reading a book, playing cards, or going to the nearby trails you will never be crowed in this 3200 square foot home room for everyone comfortably! The kitchen is built for those who love to cook! Huge Refrigerator and warming drawer along with a spare 2nd refrigerator you can bring all the food you'd love to cook. There are many outdoor activities if you chose to partake in from nature walks (take your GPS remember you are surrounded by Huron National Forest) to fishing in the catch and release pond, or watch for Coyotes, fox or Squirrels, Deer or perhaps you may even see a Bear! Although there is no hunting allowed on this property you can hunt on Federal Land nearby. There is even a shooting range for those that have a legal permit to carry, you can sight in a gun or perhaps target shooting, there is also a horseshoe pit and an outdoor fire pit with a screen top to keep the embers at a minimum. Truly a spacious private rental! Rest assured there's plenty of mother nature to take in when you visit away from it all!

Enjoy your vacation as soon as you pull in the drive of this quaint cottage. It is a short distance to access Lake Huron Beach in a quiet neighborhood that is a short distance from downtown. Vacation with ease in a fully equipped kitchen, dining area, living room, laundry, outdoor dining, and a cool recreation room just to hang out in during the day or at night. This cottage offers many amenities including fire pit, wooden swing, charcoal grill, outdoor shower to wash off some of the sand, and the recreation room with games and several VHS movies. The waterfront has shallow, crystal clear water which is great for young swimmers and water games. Just past the sand bar is deeper water for watercraft. xprop.longdesc:
Open year round! The Bay House is a 1900's vintage beach home, recently remodeled and across the street from the public beach in East Tawas, MI. This quaint cottage has beautiful views of all the summer entertainment right from the comfort of the front deck and sun porch. No matter what the weather, you'll enjoy your own relaxing spot to kick back and unwind. It's just a short 5-minute walk up to the downtown area with lots of places to explore and local dining options. Across the street are the local park with public beach access and a pier.

The cottage is clean and modern on the inside with its beach house vibe. You’ll love the clean white walls, gleaming wood floors, and marine blue decorating theme of this sweet cozy home. The living room has a cable-connected TV so you can lay back and enjoy your favorite movies and shows. There is also free Wi-Fi. The 1200 sq. ft. home has two bedrooms, one bath, and a separate dining room. It sleeps seven and is a great fit for families. However, parking is limited to four cars maximum.

The fully furnished kitchen includes a refrigerator, stove/oven, microwave, toaster, coffeemaker, dishes, glasses, utensils, cookware, and cooking utensils. The dining room table seats four, with two more at bistro table. Or enjoy eating breakfast or dinner out on the sun porch's patio table for four, or the deck's bistro table. There are lots of places to spread out and enjoy a favorite home-cooked meal, or make one table your game table! You can even grill out on the charcoal grill and serve up your vacation favorites.

Discounted Monthly Rental opportunity in off season October through May Call us for details.

Sleeping Arrangements: Bedroom 1 - Queen Bed; Bedroom 2 - Full Bed & Futon; Queen Sofa Sleeper in living room.

A Slice of Heaven is just that! Recently added to the rental inventory; home is located on 125 ft of Lake Huron sandy beach. To start off you enter the blacktop drive that has a nice, large yard area both in front and in back. Once inside, you can feel the serenity kicking in. Starting with a knotty pine interior followed by an open floor plan. As soon as you enter the living room/dining room area you can see a spectacular view. Includes awesome amenities like central air, Wi-Fi, and a lot of room to spread out inside and outside. Main bathroom has a jetted tub, while the second bathroom has a shower. The laundry room has a spare refrigerator for your use. The bunk house, located near the back-deck area, is so quaint and has just enough room to be comfortable for a good night’s rest. Also has a shower area and air unit inside, even your own little porch. The kids can play right out in front there is a larger hill, how fun! Steps are on the side leading to the beach area. Boat launch isn’t far away if you want to bring along your jet skis or small boats. Book today to enjoy; your own little slice of heaven awaits!

Open Year round! Come experience a piece of paradise at the AuSable River Bungalow. This charming rental includes air conditioning, cable, free Wi-Fi, and it can sleep up to 6 people, while located on the enchanted AuSable River. This portion of the home has 2 bedrooms 1 bath with living room and kitchen. This home has two separate entrances, one side has a full-time occupant, the other side is just for you. This home has all you need for a relaxing time, it's in a perfect location right at the mouth of the river, that leads out to Lake Huron. You can bring your own boat to tie out on the seawall or just throw a line in the water to catch a fish or two. To you Steel headers, the winter and spring fishing is awesome. Not just for summer, a holiday or winter stay would be a great getaway as well. AuSable River Bungalow is a great choice!

Positioned perfectly between Tawas and the renowned AuSable River in Oscoda, this 1542 square foot home boasts 70 feet of sandy Lake Huron frontage on some of the best shoreline in Michigan. Get away from the noise and traffic of US 23 in this quiet neighborhood. Enjoy swimming, or bring your own water toys for kayaking, paddle-boarding all from your own private beach. Every room in the house offers pristine views of aqua blue water and sensational sunrises. Recently renovated, this home has new upgrades throughout, including central air. Local attractions include Tawas Point State Park, Iargo Springs, Lumberman's Monument and the AuSable River.

xprop.longdesc:
Open Year round! Perfect Up North Cottage! Enjoy the sunsets at this 1 bedroom, 1 bath cottage on Lake Van Etten. They are so beautiful, you truly feel like you are in a different world away from it all! The peaceful environment, together with gentle breezes, creates a relaxing atmosphere that is perfect for a family get away, romantic stay for two, or just a quick getaway place to do a little fishing or swimming. This property includes a Culligan Reverse Osmosis Water Purification System. There is a boat dock for your use if you would like to bring your own boat the launch is close by. The firepit is all set up just waiting for you to bring your marshmallows! The enclosed porch area is great to sip your morning or nighttime beverage. This near 700 square foot home is laid out so well and so open. It is located within a few miles of town, in case you want to do some downtown shopping in Oscoda. No cable provided but it does have wi-fi for your electronic devices.

Discounted Monthly Rental opportunity in off season October through May Call us for details.

About the Lake: https://www.vanettenlake.org/

xprop.longdesc:
This 3-bedroom rustic cottage is one of 4 currently for rent at Aaron's Wooded Acres. This cabin has a screened-in porch. Kitchen is completely equipped with gas range, refrigerator, pots, pans, silverware, dishes, toaster and microwave. The bathroom has a stall type shower. Although gas heat is included, there is a log-burning fireplace and wood is available for purchase on site. Each cabin has Basic Cable TV, Bed linens, blankets and pillows. A fixed number of towels are provided per bathroom. Enjoy the resort's horseshoe area, volleyball, basketball, outside fire pits and park-like atmosphere. Across the road is access to Lake Huron, however it is not for small children, stairs leading into the water are steep. It has a sandy playground area, with a small slide, swings and basketball hoop. Public sandy beaches with no stairs are near by in the Tawas or Oscoda Area. Please check out cabin location on the photos. Rent one or all 4!

Aarons Wooded Acres in located in the heart of Iosco County Area which offers very scenic areas with the Tawas State Park, Light House, AuSable River, largo Springs, and Lumberman's Monument. Deer and other wildlife can be seen on the many miles of trails in Huron National Forest which covers over 100,000 acres! Cross country skiing, and snowmobiles are welcome to travel the groomed trails during the winter months. There are stores, restaurants, theaters and churches located in the communities of Tawas City, East Tawas, and Oscoda.

Limited Parking: 2 Cars Max

xprop.longdesc:
Willow Beach is the perfect area for a small family reunion or a larger family vacation! With a main home and three smaller rustic cabins, a family get-together is easily accessible. Children will love the ample room to play in the grassy backyard and on a beautiful sandy beach. Lake Huron is perfect for swimming and fishing. Imagine having all your family in the same area, laughing while enjoying dinner together and reminiscing on the deck from the main home. Lots of room for everyone! Willow Beach is conveniently located in Tawas close to shopping and the biking path that runs from Alabaster Road (Tawas city area) to Tawas Point Lighthouse in East Tawas. The main home and cabins have cable and WIFI. The main home sleeps 8 (home is open all year round) and each cabin sleeps 4 (cabins are closed each year after October 15th). Cabin amenities: 1 bedroom, 1 bath, with futon, Flat Screen TV in living room area (New as of 2019), air conditioning units, microwave, mini refrigerators, pots, pans, dishes and a hot plate to cook on (no stove or oven for the cabins)

Main Home Sleeps 8
Bed Configurations: 1 Queen (Bedroom 1), 1 Queen (Bedroom 2), 1 Full Sofa Sleeper (Living Room), 1 Full Sofa Sleeper (Upstairs Lounge Area)

3 Cabins Sleep 4 each
Bed Configurations: 1 Full (Bedroom) and 1 Sofa Sleeper or Futon (Living Room) in each cabin.

There is also a Kiddy Bed in Cabin 2

xprop.longdesc:
New Vacation Rental! This cozy 3 bedroom cottage is right on Tawas Lake! This Cottage features antique knotty pine, an enclosed sunroom, great comfortable beds and a well-stocked kitchen. The enclosed porch area is the perfect place to enjoy a morning coffee or sit back during a rainy afternoon. The family room is great for relaxing and you won't miss local TV by utilizing the Roku device hooked up to Flat Screen TV. It allows you to access to your own streaming subscriptions for watching movies, tv shows, listening to music, and even playing a game or two. The fire pit and brick paver patios is a wonderful place for family time and enjoying the wild life and remarkable Sunsets. Tawas Lake is one of the shallowest big bodies of water you will find. It is 1,760 acre fishing lake that has water depths of around 5 feet. Tawas Lake is a good place to find northern pike, bluegills, crappie, perch. Bring your boat/kayak or canoe for this vacation so you can also enjoy Tawas Lake! State owned public boat launch is south of this property. Lot size is 50 x 120.

Shed is for Owners Use Only.

xprop.longdesc:
Recently added vacation rental! Come out to Foote Dam Pond and enjoy the Treetop View. You'll find something for every outdoor lover near this beautiful 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath home. This body of water connects right to the AuSable River, for those wanting to go fishing for bass, walleye, northern pike and pan fish. The Foote Dam Pond is also perfect for swimming, sailing and boating the launches are located along the shore lines. Just bring your own boat and enjoy! You are so close to the ORV trails you can go explore the vast Huron National Forest. Want to rent a pontoon? Here is that info to call for details SunnyBunns Watercraft Rentals 989-820-6186 After you've enjoyed all that Huron National Forest has to offer, check out Desi's restaurant. They also offer breakfast and lunch, so don't limit yourself to just their delightful dinners! Following your day on the lake, come back home and enjoy some quality time with your family. If you aren't quite ready to call it a night in front of the TV, take pleasure in a fire out in the backyard. When you are ready for bed, turn down the lights and enjoy the stars from your Treetop View. 

Please be advised: Property has 100 stairs to reach the water and deck area, as you can imagine treetop view, it will take a bit to get to the bottom and a bit to get back up to the top so it is not recommended for anyone that would have issues in climbing up or down stairs.  It is on a steep hill/incline.  Please see photos.

Bed Configurations: 1 King (Bedroom 1), 1 Queen (Bedroom 2), 1 Full (Bedroom 3)

New Vacation Rental for 2020! Family friendly, unplug, unwind and enjoy Lake Huron! This is a 2 bedroom home located right on Lake Huron. With a large yard area and beautiful stone stairway to the water, this area of Lake Huron is perfect for wading out the water as it stays shallow for a ways out. It is a unique property the way the property is situated with the trees, the sunrises warm you in the morning. Then by early afternoon, the trees provide the shade. Perfect for the beach lovers, you can just situate yourself for full sun or shade!  Property has an awesome sunroom if you prefer to just enjoy the views. Property has 35 feet on Lake Huron you can sit out on the boat house roof or sit right on the beach it feels so private, plus you are only about 8 miles from Tawas area or about 10 miles from Au Gres either way both have stores for you.

What a convenient location! This home is literally a couple blocks from downtown where restaurants, live music, shopping, ice cream etc. are all located. This cute place, that sleeps 4, is just a short distance from the East Tawas Beach and Boat dock right on Lake Huron. Come and enjoy all that Lake Huron has to offer and don't forget Newman Street, visit all the shops or enjoy some outdoor dining. There is also a playground at the park to enjoy on a sunny afternoon or you can sit on the front porch and watch unique kites being flown over the dock. Even go down the street to get some pizza and watch the Live Street Dance on Tuesday nights, or take in a movie in the evening. If you are looking to have convenience at your fingertips, this is the place for you!

xprop.longdesc:
The Beach House is a 1200 square foot home that has 2 bedrooms (2nd floor), 1 bath (1st floor) and plenty enough room to sleep 8. This home is one of 4 homes on the same property and is beautifully furnished for the Michigan vacation getaway you have been dreaming of. This outstanding home is also perfect for a romantic getaway. The Beach House is located right on Lake Huron, next to the Lakeshore home. Enjoy gazing at the stars at the waters edge or view it from your second story bedroom. This is not just an ordinary Michigan resort vacation home, but one filled with special touches. From the telescope used to view passing birds, boats, or freighters to the cedar lined closets, topped off with an electric fireplace and beautiful hardwood 6 panel doors, you will know that this is a quality two story lakefront home has been thoughtfully designed and decorated with our special guests in mind.  This beautifully modern home has an unobstructed view of Lake Huron that is almost surreal. You can get that view from the upstairs balcony before you go to sleep or from on the back deck with your morning coffee. Not only is the outside view great but the electric fireplace inside makes for many beautiful nights. The Beach House is very modern yet comfortable. Your children will also find themselves right at home with beautiful sandy beach to play on. The Beach House is not just a house you will rent, but a house you will love.

Limited Parking: 3 cars max

When in need of a break, why not vacation at a lake? The Captain's Watch is ideal for any such getaway. This charming two story cabin has 1 bedroom (2nd floor) and 1 bathroom (1st floor) but can sleep 4. So it could be enough room for the whole family or just right for two. This cabin is one of 4 homes on the same property located and attached to the back side of the Beach Club Lakeshore (don't worry, there are separate entrances). The view of the lake from the main floor is not available, but its upper level has a large window overlooking Lake Huron, which gives the feel of being on a ship looking over the watery path ahead. You could also relax around the white patio set while enjoying the sunshine or having a bit of conversation with family and friends. There is also a shared fire pit and picnic table for a little bit of beach dining. Maybe grill some burgers as the kids are challenging one another to a game of horseshoes. You be the captain and order up some relaxation and great memories.

The Garden Cottage is one of 4 homes on the same fabulous property and is located behind the Beach House with views of the lake on each side of the Beach House. This lakefront home is composed of 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and has enough room to sleep 5. This Cottage has always thrilled our guests and is very popular with pet lovers! For those guests who don't like to travel without their pampered pet, one well trained dog is welcome here at The Garden Cottage Our guests regularly say that they feel so at home and so comfortable that they just don't want to leave. This cottage also has a gas fireplace and a private patio. From the warm cottage color to the beautiful decor, everything you will need is here. Guests will enjoy a comfortable living room with beautiful lake views, a large sofa, well equipped kitchen, bathroom with a large shower and of course a huge sandy beach! Wait... there is more! The new owners have made some great updates to the units including new grills, umbrella to go with the outdoor furniture for shade and a new rainbow play set for the kids to enjoy!

xprop.longdesc:
Lake Shore is one of four homes on the same property that sleeps up to 6 with ease. This upscale lodge decor will charm you from the minute the door opens. The large living room features a natural fireplace with a sliding glass door opening onto a private lakefront patio. This open layout with Pergo floors is so inviting, everything inside is just beautiful. The master bedroom features a magnificant queen sized, feather bed, high thread count sheets, flecked berber carpeting, ceiling fan, an antique dresser, 19" cable television and mirrored closet doors. There is a perfect view of Lake Huron and our guests will be able to listen to the comforting sound of the waves at night. The second bedroom is furnished with 2 single beds covered with attractive quilts and another white lighted fan adorns the ceiling. Bring along a game system and plug right into the front of the 13" cable television. The nautical accents are fun and whimsical. Mirrored closet doors open to reveal horse shoes, racquets, games, puzzles and toys. Our guests will sigh with pleasure when they find the brand new spacious full bathroom with large ceramic tiles, deep jetted tub, sink with a marble top and oval mirror. With comforts like this, we hope that you and your family will make this your very special vacation rental home. Wait... there is more! Stackable washer and dryer!
